Authentication activity associated with.Data: Zeek http.log, Zeek conn.log, Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625
Authentication activity associated with.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log for connection attempts and access to web applications/services. Correlate activity with Windows Event ID 4624/4625 for successful/failed logons potentially tied to web service access (e.g., via SSO). Identify requests/logons from unexpected user accounts or accounts created recently. Use descriptive statistics to find rare accounts or sudden spikes in activity for specific services.

Access to web applications/services from.Data: Zeek http.log, Zeek conn.log, Windows Event ID 4624
Access to web applications/services from.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log and conn.log for source IP addresses and connection patterns to web applications/services. Geolocate source IPs from Zeek logs. Compare source IPs and user-agent strings with expected patterns for users accessing these services. Use percentile analysis or clustering to identify outlier source IPs or abnormal user-agent combinations. Correlate Zeek data with Windows Event ID 4624 if host/source info is logged.
